pair.title: Pair your Samsung Smart Aircon
pair.setup_intro: This will add a Wi-Fi connected Samsung Smart aircon to your Homey
pair.discovery: Homey will attempt to automatically discover your Samsung Smart Aircon
pair.setup_failed_hint: Make sure the aircon is powered and connected to your Wi-Fi network
pair.authDescription: Device found. Please power on the device within the next 30 seconds
